ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Mages soloing..... err Grouping?
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried this on Minos and reavers.  The reavers I could handle some of the time, but the minos were nearly always too tough for me.  You must have had better
ygData.messageBody:
I tried this on Minos and reavers. The reavers I could handle some of the
time, but the minos were nearly always too tough for me. You must have had
better equipment than I did, they just did way too much damage and knocked
off my songs way too often for this to work on minos effectively. Ditto
with the big spiders. If it wasn't low blue there was no way this would
work for me unless the mob was weak for its con.

One question? How the heck did you have HtH at 100 starting at level 14?
It can't hit 100 till level 19.

Kit

***
Gorge of King Xorbb
DDD/CoD/HoR
Muddites, Mino's (careful on big ones, sometimes had to zone to runnyeye)
I had hand to hand at 100 since level 14 (I started using it in some groups
with all-instrument at level 12)
***
East Karana
DDD/CoD/HoR
Lions, Spiders, Gnoll Reavers etc.
(Pull singles to a zone edge (river, canyon etc) and use all instrument)

Basically there wasn't anything blue I couldn't handle if I was careful
I got about 1.5 bubble of xp per hour. Went from 18 to 20 in about 3 days
RL (3 hrs a night or so)
